posts.post_content:
I don't have any of these yet, so I'm open to looking at any of them!
Can probably afford examples in the VG-VGEX ranges
Thanks,
Jason

UPDATE:  down to 4 needed - see below

Now resides in an SGC 40 holder. $225 delivered.

Email: [url]jacklitsch@comcast.net[/url]

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g5/jacklitsch1/Tobacco%20Cards/ZimmermanT222.jpg[/IMG]
And joining his teammate is catcher Jimmy Archer.   Raw $100pd.

Ok, so I have acquired 3 of the 8 in the team set, but I am still looking for examples of the following.  I can't afford more than a VG of any of these, and while I dont want any disastrous beaters, I do prioritize registration, then creasing, and then centering.  Back damage doesn't matter much.

Roger Bresnahan
Thomas Leach
Arthur Phelan
Frank Schulte
Vic Saier


Please PM if you have any of these available.
Thanks,
Jason L

Hello Jason,

I have a Roger Bresnahan T222 available for sale. Has a few condition isuues such as being trimmed at the top, glue residue on back, #16 printed on the back, short line of ink a third of the way up on the front right side, and small edge rips, etc. 

Scans will show all.

Despite the noted flaws, the card still presents pretty well. If interested let me know.

I'm looking for $80.00 delivered. 

Check or United States Postal Money are O.K. I do not use PayPal.

Patrick

Hi Jason,

Wasn't sure if the PM went through. Payment can be sent to:

Patrick McMenemy
P.O. Box 681
Saco, ME 04072

Thanks,

Patrick

I have made some great progress on the Cubs team set this year, but I am still looking for these 4 cards in VG or less kind of shape.  They can have problems, but they need to have clear registration, good contrast, and generally good eye appeal.  Back damage, writing on the back, some creasing, and off-centering don't bother me too much.
Please let me know if you have one of these that might fit the bill!
I hope to complete this team set this year, because I need to move on to the T204 and T3 Cubs...ugh.

Thomas Leach
Arthur Phelan
Frank Schulte
Vic Saier

Thanks,
Jason

Still looking for the 4 listed in the most recent post...anything decent looking (good registration and contrast) and priced $200 or less gets very quick consideration! 

Thanks,
Jason

Can anyone direct me to collector-grade (VG-ish) of the 4 following Cubbies?!?!?!
Thomas Leach
Arthur Phelan
Frank Schulte
Vic Saier

Good Registration and contrast are most important, fewer creases the better, and backs are not important...
let me know what you may have for sale!!

Thanks,
Jason
